resources.string:
Hungarian version is in beta - thus, many source texts are not yet available. Also some special cases for Hungarian liturgical calendar are not yet finished. Expected date of finishing: mid of 2012. If you may help us with completing HTML source files, please contact us (HTML base knowledge is required).


Best wishes,
 Juraj Vidéky (videky@breviar.sk), Richard Královič (riso@ksp.sk)
